column3: My [comment](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6564#issuecomment-178636856) remains that I would prefer VerifyLockTime not be encapsulated for reuse for nLockTime and nSequence checks. \n
@morcos @petertodd I agree the encapsulation hampers readability. I propose something like 2fcd56f.\n

I've squashed to two commits. 53e53a3 corresponds to the state of #6564 as per OP and c3c3752 (was 2fcd56f) addresses request from @morcos and @petertodd.

Previous branch state for verification [`checksequenceverify_2fcd56f`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/compare/master...btcdrak:checksequenceverify_2fcd56f).
This `return false` here seems to come out of the blue, which could make people misread the code and introduce bugs. I'd suggest adding the `))` to the line before it, or surrounding with `{}`.\n
